Uses of Package
ff

  • Packages that use ff 
    Package Description
    ff
    Provides the classes to manage the force field.
    md
    Provides the classes to manage the information of MD system (residue, segment, box).
  • Classes in ff used by ff 
    Class and Description
    ForceField
    Provides force functions.
    FuncAngle
    Harmonic energy function for the angle
    FuncBond
    Harmonic energy function for the bond
    FuncDihed
    Harmonic energy function for the bond
    FuncDihedChild
    Energy function for the dihedral angle
    FuncUB
    Harmonic energy function for the angle
    VdW
    Non-bonded van der Waals parameters
  • Classes in ff used by md 
    Class and Description
    ForceField
    Provides force functions.
    VdW
    Non-bonded van der Waals parameters
